title: Communal Double Feature - Ghetto Freaks + Satan's Children
description:
COMMUNAL DOUBLE FEATURE - Ghetto Freaks and Satan's Children

MPEG-4 files, each fits on 1 CD.

Films about the good and evil of communal life in early 1970s America.

Ghetto Freaks was originally released in 1970 as "Love Commune" but was re-released under this new title with additional scenes of an African American super-bad religious love-in. If the trailer for Ghetto Freaks is to be believed, it was also filmed as a musical with songs & choreography (thankfully all that's been excised from Ghetto Freaks). Starring . . . nobody.

Satan's Children is obscure but noteworthy as a different sort of devil movie. It's about homophobia and machismo, incest, followers and leaders, all filmed on the cheap in Florida. Starring . . . nobody.

Released by Something Weird on separate discs. This torrent includes an Intermissionary file with a contemporary documentary about the "religious awakening" of the counterculture in the early 1970s, the Ghetto Freaks trailer, and a pseudo-documentary about European youths emulating and surpassing the American hippie culture in hedonism and ridiculousness.
